class solution.base_class.AuditAttributesMixin[source]

Audit Attributes Mixin

Variables

  • pk_id (int) – pk_id

  • created_by (str) – user name of creator

  • created_on – timestamp while creating

  • last_updated_by (str) – user name of updater

  • last_updated_on – timestamp while updating

  • is_active (bool) – active status
